step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders relatively stable. Focus on opening your fingers wider in the next repetitions.
Your shoulders are well-aligned. Try to straighten your arms more and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist.
Excellent control! Continue to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down.
Great work relaxing and exhaling. Ensure your arms fully extend overhead as you stretch back.
You're doing well! Keep up the good work with the arm movements and shoulder blade squeezes.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. This helps build strength and promotes lymph drainage.
